summary: Implemented a new Custom Domain setup UI panel with domain input persisted in localStorage, copy-to-clipboard for the current app/canister URL, and added English documentation (README + docs page) describing DNS setup and troubleshooting.

hallucinated_features.description: Documentation includes provider-specific DNS setup walkthroughs (Cloudflare, Namecheap, GoDaddy, Google Domains), whereas the requirement called for provider-agnostic instructions.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-2 requests provider-agnostic DNS guidance; adding per-provider step lists goes beyond what was asked and may reduce provider-agnostic framing.
